about_the_game:
A lone wolf, leading a double life as a gas station worker and for something more criminal...
His carefully crafted life is shattered when an encounter with an ordinary customer at the gas station sparks an unexpected connection.

Will his secrets be unraveled to the world?
Join Tyoma as he struggles to navigate his sense of self and find his footing in this world.




  • Hand-drawn environments and characters
  • Short experience, ongoing storyline
  • Branching story paths, with multiple endings
  • Point and Click exploration with secrets to know more about the game's lore
  • Art gallery with unlockable images

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages:
Acts of Crime, Drug Use, Occasional/Suggested Violence, Explicit Language and General Mature Content

detailed_description:
A lone wolf, leading a double life as a gas station worker and for something more criminal...
His carefully crafted life is shattered when an encounter with an ordinary customer at the gas station sparks an unexpected connection.

Will his secrets be unraveled to the world?
Join Tyoma as he struggles to navigate his sense of self and find his footing in this world.




  • Hand-drawn environments and characters
  • Short experience, ongoing storyline
  • Branching story paths, with multiple endings

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 309 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 309 MB available space

name: Vs. Self

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 309 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tyoma leads a double life... a life of crime and deception. His carefully crafted life is thrown into shambles when he creates an unexpected bond with a gas station customer.
